settings.bodyId:
About the finish
・ Printing is done with a laser engraving machine. In actual products, the appearance of colors differs depending on the amount of light and the angle.
・ We will process it on the front of the main body. The back (opposite side) has the KINTO original logo mark.
-The size and position of the engraving are determined for each shape of the main body.
-The color of the engraving is determined for each color of the main body.
-The design and characters displayed on the screen are simulations. The color and position of the engraving may differ from the actual one.
-The actual marking position and color may look different depending on your monitor and browser environment.
・ Depending on the color of the main body, it may be difficult to see the engraving.
・ Even if you purchase multiple units of the same color, the finished color of the engraving may differ slightly.
・ Since each item is manually processed, some distortion or deviation may be seen.
・ This service is available only at the time of purchase and cannot be processed into products that have already been used.
・ Cancellation after ordering cannot be accepted. If you are applying

for
10 or more items , please contact us using this inquiry form .

Payment
・ The following payment methods are available.

Credit card payment
[Types of credit cards that can be used]
VISA, MasterCard, AMEX, JCB

About delivery
・ It will take 6 business days from the day after the order date to deliver.
・ Saturdays, Sundays, and holidays, as well as holidays such as the year-end and New Year holidays and Obon festival, cannot be shipped without permission. note that.
・ We do not accept overseas shipments or deliveries to overseas shipping agents.
・ It may change depending on the holidays and congestion.

Returns / Cancellations
・ All customized products are original products for our customers. Please note that we cannot accept returns, exchanges or cancellations.
・ We make every effort to ensure the quality of our products, but if you find any defects in the delivered products, please contact us within 7 days of the arrival of the products by using the inquiry form or by phone. ..

About design contents
・ Processed designs created by customers do not use words or expressions that are offensive to public order and morals (such as swearing words, insulting / discriminatory expressions, inappropriate slang, and expressions that incite violence), and are written by third parties. Kinto Co., Ltd. shall not be liable for any dispute with the right holder, assuming that it does not infringe any rights, trademark rights, design rights, or other legal rights. In addition, quotations such as brand names, product names, service names, company names, store names, copyrighted works, or processed designs with partial citations associated with these cases cannot be used. Kinto Co., Ltd. reserves the right to invalidate your order due to the content of the processing design such as violation of the rules.
settings.textBelowId: I agree with the above and add it to my cart.
